name: Sky Threat Sky Fate
description:
Sky Threat Sky Fate (Twine Game)

***This game is created for educational purposes.

Due to the nature of the game, there is a gameplay cycle that you choose to read the story parts and choose from the options given later. You will achieve different results by directing the story with the choices you make.

•In the game, Nick Fury in the 2012 Avengers movie is your character, and there are many critical decisions that he will make throughout the movie. The path you follow according to these decisions can lead you to several different conclusions.
•
•Along this way, you can access some extra story information or encounter endings that you would never have predicted.
